portal.support.tickets.body.text: Stayed tuned for an incredible support experience.{br}{br}In the meantime, please click the support link to our external support tool{br}to log any support tickets and follow up on your outstanding tickets. Thank you!
portal.support.documentation.body.text: Stayed tuned for an incredible support experience.{br}{br}In the meantime, please click the provided link to download{br}our current set of documentation. Thank you!
